title: Sherlock Holmes Adventures
author: Arthur Conan Doyle
description: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes is a collection of twelve short stories by Arthur Conan Doyle, first published on 14 October 1892

title: Last Day
author: Luanne Rice
description: From celebrated New York Times bestselling author Luanne Rice comes a riveting story of a seaside community shaken by a violent crime and a tragic loss.
